statements.quote: Although I have to tell you, we have General Kelly here today, and we stopped 78 percent -- going up to 80 percent -- on the border traffic coming through, in just a short period of time.
As you know, I have General Kelly here.  We stopped traffic coming through -- 78 percent.  It’s going to be, I think, 81 percent this quarter, which is a record.
And in fact, General Kelly, who was in charge of Homeland Security, where people coming in down 78 and almost 80 percent.

I'm very proud of General Kelly, what he's done on the border. One of the reasons he's my Chief of Staff right now is because he did such an outstanding job at the border. We're down 78 percent. Nobody thought that would be -- I mean, in the old days, with other administrations, if you were down 1 percent, it was considered a big thing. We're down 78 percent at the border, and nobody thought that was possible. So I'm very proud of General Kelly. He's now Chief of Staff.
As you know, the border was a tremendous problem and they’re close to 80 percent stoppage.
You know, the border is down 78 percent.  Under past administrations, the border didn’t go down — it went up.
Immigration went down 78 percent at the border – 78 percent at the border. Kelly’s done a great job.
Since I took office we have cut illegal immigration on our southern border by record numbers. 78%.

name: border apprehensions down about 80% under Trump
